name: Tappy Plane (Christian)
description:
Tappy Plane

Tappy Plane is an arcade game where the objective is to avoid rocks and go as far as you can with your unbelievably unsafe plane. How many rocks can you avoid?

Controls Jump Space / Left Mouse Button / Touch Pause P Restart (on Game Over) R Credits

Assets made by Kenney.
Music and SFX licensed under CC0 and available at OpenGameArt.
Special thanks to Joth and pauliuw for the Music and SFX.

Made with Godot as a learning experiment, code is open source at Github.
